law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, Part III of this subtitle applies to all proceedings ...

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, Part III of this subtitle applies to all proceedings under this subtitle.

An individual or a support enforcement agency may initiate a proceeding authorized under this subtitle by filing a complaint in an initiating tribunal for forwarding to a responding tribunal or by filing a complaint or a comparable pleading directly in a tribunal of another state which has or can obtain personal jurisdiction over the defendant.
